subject: Baseball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Brian McNamee, who told Congress that he had injected pitcher Roger Clemens with steroids, was charged on Long Island with driving while intoxicated, driving while impaired by drugs and unlicensed driving.
snippet: Brian McNamee, who told Congress that he had injected pitcher Roger Clemens with steroids, was charged on Long Island with driving while intoxicated, driving while impaired by drugs and unlicensed driving.
